menu.name: gameplay
menu.desc: Change gameplay options for VS Impostor such as middlescroll, hitsounds...

checkbox.name: Camera Movement
checkbox.desc: If checked, the camera will move with the notes' direction.

checkbox.name: Cutscenes in freeplay
checkbox.desc: If checked, SCRIPTED cutscenes will always play in freeplay.

checkbox.name: Middlescroll
checkbox.desc: If checked, centers the player's strums to the middle.

checkbox.name: Hide opponent notes
checkbox.desc: If checked, will make the opponent's notes invisible.

checkbox.name: Hitsounds
checkbox.desc: If checked, a tick sound will occur on every note hit.

menu.name: visuals
menu.desc: Change visuals options for VS Impostor such as flashing lights, jumpscares, camera movement...

checkbox.name: Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be flashing lights in some songs. (MAY BE SENSITIVE FOR PEOPLE WITH EPILEPSY)

checkbox.name: Screen Shake
checkbox.desc: If checked, screen shaking will occur in some songs.

checkbox.name: Jumpscares
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be jumpscares in certain songs.

menu.name: languages
menu.desc: Change the current game's language. Leave all blank for english. (ALPHA)

checkbox.name: Arabic
checkbox.desc: Changes the game's language to Arabic.

checkbox.name: Swedish
checkbox.desc: Changes the game's language to Swedish.

checkbox.name: Indonesian
checkbox.desc: Changes the game's language to Indonesian.

checkbox.name: Developer Mode
checkbox.desc: If checked, you get access to developer tools. (Look at songs/devStuff.hx in the files for the tools you can use)
